metadata.title: CVE-2021-47547 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:tulip: de4x5: fix the problem that the array 'lp->phy[8]' may be out ofbound In line 5001, if all id in the array 'lp->phy[8]' is not 0, when the'for' end, the 'k' is 8. At this time, the array 'lp->phy[8]' may be out ofbound.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
